radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral hyperintensity in the globus pallidus.
Bilateral hyperintense signal of hippocampus, cortex of the temporal lobe, and caudate and lenticular nucleus.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat CT scan after 4 days showed subtle decreased attenuation of the basal ganglia; on day 5, there was hyperintense signal in the basal ganglia, hippocampus, and cerebral cortex bilaterally.
After 4 days, showed subtle decreased attenuation of the basal ganglia.
